amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to insert at the end of the bill (before the short title) a new section titled Limitation on Contracts stating that none of the funds made available under the Act may be used to fund any contract in contravention of section 8(d)(6) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 637 (d)(6)).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kilpatrick amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
